name: Melissa Johnston
offering: Business Coaching, Financial Coaches, Group Coaching, Intuition Coaching, Marketing Coach, Mastermind Groups, Podcast Host, Public Speaking, Sales Training, Spiritual Coaching
what_you_do: Melissa Marina Johnston is a keynote speaker and subconscious healer who helps high achievers and spiritual leaders overcome subconscious fears and societal expectations to align with their true calling and create a freedom-based lifestyle.
who_you_serve: She serves awakened high achievers and spiritual leaders, guiding them to break free from limitations and step into their true purpose.
seeking: Media appearances, travel and lifestyle influencer partnerships (UGC).
current_projects: Free resources, VIP list for trainings and events, and a transformational workbook available on Amazon.
bio: Award winner 2025, engaged audience of 42K+ followers across platforms.
